values.language-designer-gen-get-sharing-descri: Generate a sharing link to my map view.
values.language-designer-gen-add-layer-config-t: Add layer from an Esri portal
values.language-designer-gen-add-layer-config-m: Add layers from an ArcGIS Enterprise Portal or ArcGIS Online
values.language-designer-gen-upload-file-menuit: Automatically detect and apply default settings.
values.language-designer-gen-upload-file-config: Review, adjust, and configure file data.
values.language-designer-gen-text-config-text:
# Capital City
### Welcome to Capital City and VertiGIS Studio Web.
-----
### Here are some things to try:
- Zoom in on the map to see some of the infrastructure located within Capital City.
- Click on map features to view their attributes, related records, and attachments.
- Use the identify tool to capture a variety of data within a specified area.
- Try using the search box to find map data within the visible extent by keywords such as 'restaurant'.
- Toggle the map into 3D mode to experience the data at a whole new level.

 ![VertiGIS Studio logo](https://www.arcgis.com/sharing/rest/content/items/176b1e8474dd4fc0a4672e256459861b/data)
values.language-designer-gen-configure-layer-me: Configure some common settings for this layer.
values.language-designer-gen-remove-layer-menui: Remove the layer from the map.
values.language-designer-gen-zoom-to-extent-men: Zooms to the full extent of the layer.
values.language-designer-gen-zoom-to-visible-me: Zoom to the closest scale where the layer becomes visible.
values.language-designer-gen-keep-filtered-resu: Removes results that do not not belong to this subset.
values.language-designer-gen-pulse-menuitemdesc: Create a temporary highlight on the result(s).
values.language-designer-gen-remove-results-men: Remove the result(s) from result set.
values.language-designer-gen-export-features-to: Export the result(s) to a CSV file.
Export the result(s) to an XLSX file.
values.language-designer-gen-zoom-to-results-me: Zoom to the result(s) on the map.
values.language-designer-gen-draw-point-menuite: Draw a point on the map.
values.language-designer-gen-draw-line-menuitem: Draw a line on the map.
values.language-designer-gen-draw-polygon-menui: Draw a polygon on the map.
values.language-designer-gen-clear-markup-menui: Removes all markup from the map.
values.language-designer-gen-identify-menuitemd: Click, tap, or draw a rectangle on the map to identify results.
values.language-designer-gen-image-config-alt-t: Capital City, blue circle with silhouette of a tree on a building within it.
values.language-designer-gen-map-identify-menui: Identify this point on the map.
values.language-designer-gen-load-project-menui: Upload a project file to resume a saved project state.
values.language-designer-gen-return-to-initial-: Return to the initial map position and zoom level.
values.language-designer-gen-return-to-previous: Return to the previous map position and zoom level.
values.language-designer-gen-return-to-next-vie: Return to the next map position and zoom level.
values.language-designer-gen-save-project-menui: Saves a project from the application's current state.
values.language-designer-gen-toggle-results-dis: Switches to viewing results in the list.
Switches to viewing results in the table.
values.language-designer-gen-measure-pipe-descr: Measure the length of the water line(s).
values.language-designer-gen-measure-polyline-d: Measure a line on the map.
values.language-designer-gen-measurement-show-s: Show the measurement system and units settings dialog.
values.language-designer-gen-buffer-menuitemdes: Allows the user to draw on the map; the captured geometry is buffered and used to perform an identify.
Opens a dialog where buffer settings can be set.
values.language-designer-gen-results-context-me: Buffers a set of results and performs an identify with the buffered area.
values.language-designer-gen-edit-markup-menuit: Select markup and edit its geometry and symbol.
values.language-designer-gen-filter-layer-menui: Open the filter tool for this layer.
values.language-designer-gen-geometry-toolbar-e: Alter the style of the markup.
values.language-designer-gen-geometry-toolbar-c: Discard all changes to this geometry.
Keep all changes to this geometry and proceed.
values.language-designer-gen-map-context-menuit: Adds a configurable note to the map at the selected location.
Edits a created note on the map at the selected location.
values.language-designer-gen-export-markup-menu: Exports all markup to a shapefile
values.language-designer-gen-move-fire-hydrant-: Move this fire hydrant to a new location.
values.language-designer-gen-hide-layer-labels-: Turns off the layer's labels on the map.
values.language-designer-gen-show-layer-labels-: Turns on the layer's labels on the map.
values.language-designer-gen-show-starred-descr: Restores all previously starred results as current results.
values.language-designer-gen-show-clear-descrip: Removes all starred results, leaving you with an empty list.
values.language-designer-gen-add-features-to-st: Adds result(s) to starred results list.
values.language-designer-gen-query-layer-menuit: Open the query tool for this layer.
values.language-designer-gen-remove-features-fr: Remove result(s) from starred results list.
values.language-designer-gen-snapping-activate-: Activates snapping guides on all supported layers.
values.language-designer-gen-snapping-deactivat: Deactivates snapping guides on all layers where snapping is not required.
values.language-designer-gen-configure-layer-la: Configure some common label settings for this layers features.
values.language-designer-gen-map-context-menuit: Moves a note on the map to a new location.
values.language-designer-gen-query-builder-draw: Search within the bounds of a buffered line.
Search within the bounds of a polygon.
Search within the bounds of a rectangle.
values.language-designer-gen-query-builder-edit: Select and edit search area geometry.
